label: Discovery & Research
description: Identify what we’re building and see who else is doing awesome work in this space.

label: Style & Tone
description: Explore *our* version of a solution, how might it look and feel?

label: Present Ideas
description: Gather feedback, identify areas of improvement, and solidify shared vision.

label: Identify Constraints
description: Trim scope, limit features to clearest expression of the solution.

label: Test, Optimize & Iterate
description: Did the solution perform as expected? What’s next? How can we make it better?
